model.name: ONCE Kernel Default Port 42777 Architecture
model.title: ONCE Kernel Default Port 42777 Architecture
model.description: ONCE server shall start by default on port 42777 instead of using environment variables. Server must auto-generate its own uuid.scenario.json file in the standard Web4 format with model containing: pid (Process ID), state (LifecycleState), platform (EnvironmentInfo), domain (reverse internet domain like com.ceruleancircle, default: local.once), host (fully qualified hostname), ip (fallback: 127.0.0.1), capabilities array with {capability, port} objects for httpPort, httpsPort, wsPort
